column3: 2015 at 2:00 P.M. from Otts Funeral Home Chapel with burial in the Sulligent City Cemetery. Bro. Randy Gunter will officiate. Visitation will be at the funeral home Monday afternoon from 1:00 until service time at 2:00 P.M. Pallbearers will be Chris Karr
column8: and Stan Karr. Honorary pallbearers will be Trice Perry and Clark Rye.
